The Scribble Pad Toolbar

See Scribble Pad for full details on the scribble pad layer.


Figure 1. The Scribble Pad Toolbar


Toolbar option

Allows you to

 
Activate /    De-Activate Scribble Pad

Switch the scribble pad layer on and off.  De-activating / hiding the scribble pad layer does not save the contents automatically, it just removes the scribble layer so you can see your map without it.
        Move To Back / Front Move the scribble pad layer behind the node and link layers, so you can access standard map node or link options. You can switch it back to the front again when ready to do more scribbling. The button always reflects the current position of the Scribble layer, and pressing it, reverses the position.
  Save Scribble Pad Save the scribble pad layer contents to the database against the specific map view.
  Clear Scribble Pad Clear the scribble pad contents.

NOTE: Don't forget to save, if you want to permanently clear a scribble pad layer from a map.
  Pencil Tool Do free hand drawing.
  Line Tool Draw straight lines
  Square / Rectangle Tool Draw squares and rectangles
  Circle/Oval Tool Draw circles and ovals.
Colour Chooser Set the line colour for drawing. It opens the Colour chooser dialog to let you select a colour:

Line Thickness Dropdown

Set the line thickness.
